newsitem.title: USA: New issues on municipal calendar - updated 7/21/97.
newsitem.headline: New issues on municipal calendar - updated 7/21/97.

text.p: The following new issues were added to the municipal sales calendar:
$1.195 Shelby Cty Sch Dist Fin Corp., Ky. REV 7/29/97
$85.000 San Mateo Cty Transportation, Calif. GO 8/5/97
$70.000 San Mateo Cty Transit Dist., Calif. GO 8/5/97
$60.000 Lewisville Ind Sch Dist, Texas GO 8/12/97
$3.115 Western Wis. Tech College Dist, Wis. GO 8/19/97
$1.640 St. Joseph Cty, Mich. GO rescheduled from 7/24 to 7/29/97
$17.025 Monroe Cty Hosp Auth, Ind. Smith Barney wk 7/21
$103.030 Fairfax Cty Water Authority, Va. Wheat First wk 7/28
$30.000 Oregon Hsg & Comm Services Dept. Smith Barney wk 7/28
$22.855 Wake Cty, N.C. First Union wk 7/28
$700.000 New York State Environmental Unknown wk 8/4
$435.000 New York City Muni Water Fin Agency Unknown wk 8/4
$175.000 New York City Muni Water Fin Agency Unknown wk 8/4
$150.000 New York State Environmental Unknown wk 8/4
$11.807 North Hempstead, N.Y. BAN's Series D 7/24/97
$5.000 Benton Harbor Sch Dist, Mich. state aid notes 7/31/97
